channel.title: Innovation Range – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: SEERS Innovation Deluxe 2 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
The Innovation 2 Section Deluxe Couch is suitable for use within specialist Critical Care environments, such as Endoscopy, Ultrasound Scanning, and minor treatment procedures. Electric height, backrest and 2-way tilt ensures smooth transition when positioning patient for specialist procedures and treatments. Auto-electric CPR functionality and auto-levelling software returns the couch quickly to a fully horizontal position in the event of an emergency.

SEERS Innovation Deluxe 2 Section Couch - Model Choices

MG2475 - Electric Height Elevation with Electric Backrest and 2-way tilt - Individual locking castors MG2675 - Electric Height Elevation with Electric Backrest and 2-way tilt - linked central locking wheel system Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Deluxe Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 250kgs (550lbs = 39 stone)
  • Auto-electric CPR function via handswitch
  • Electric profiling with auto-intelligent operation
  • Vertical lifting design with stabilty throughout
  • Electric height adjustment from 45cm to 97cm
  • Electric head section with positive and negative angle of 0 to +80 degrees
  • Large diameter castors (125mm)
  • Individual braked or central locking wheel system
  • Acrylic capped vac formings to facilitate easy cleaning
  • Anti-bacterial powder coated framework
  • Anti-microbial fire retardant upholstery
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Contoured standard upholstery width of 70cm
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Breathing hole and plug
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • IV Pole
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support

The Innovation 3 Section Deluxe Couch is suitable for use within specialist Critical Care environments. Electric height, backrest, foot section and 2-way tilt ensures smooth transition when positioning patient for specialist procedures and treatments. Auto-electric CPR functionality and auto-levelling software returns the couch quickly to a fully horizontal position in the event of an emergency.

item.title: SEERS Innovation Deluxe Daycare Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
The Innovation Day Care Couch was designed with a high emphasis on patient comfort and security, as well as improved manual handling solutions for the clincian. The fully electric functionality is driven by the introduction of intelligent auto-levelling software, providing smooth vertical lifting and patient profiling. The auto-electric CPR function returns the couch quickly to a fully horizontal position in the event of an emergency. Infection control issues are also addressed with the smooth anti-microbial acrylic capped vac formings minimising dirt traps and making the couch easy to clean. Adding to this, the couch has an antibacterial powder coated frame.

SEERS Innovation Deluxe Daycare Couch - Model Choices

MG3493 - Electric Height Elevation with Electric Back & footrest and 2-way tilt - Individual locking castors MG3693 - Electric Height Elevation with Electric Back& footrest and 2-way tilt - linked central locking wheel system Download PDF

  • Electric head section with positive and negative angle of 0 to +80 degrees
  • Electric foot section with positive and negative angle of +10 to -30 degrees
  • Large diameter castors (125mm)

The fully electric functionality is driven by the introduction of intelligent auto-levelling software, providing smooth vertical lifting and patient profiling. The auto-electric CPR function returns the couch quickly to a fully horizontal position in the event of an emergency. Infection control issues are also addressed with the smooth anti-microbial acrylic capped vac formings minimising dirt traps and making the couch easy to clean. Adding to this, the couch has an antibacterial powder coated frame.

item.title: SEERS Innovation Standard 2 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
The Innovation 2 Section Standard Couch features a fully electric height adjustment as well as an electric profiling backrest. With the ability to support very heavy patients, the 2 section standard model is suitable for a wide range of general examination and minor treatment procedures. With the choice of individual locking castors or linked central locking wheel system, this product is very versatile in various applications when fitted with optional accessories.

SEERS Innovation Standard 2 Section Couch - Model Choices

MG2470 - Electric Height Elevation with Electric Backrest - Individual locking castors MG2670 - Electric Height Elevation with Electric Backrest - linked central locking wheel system Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 250kgs (550lbs = 39 stone)
  • Electric height adjustment from 45cm to 97cm
  • Electric head section with positive and negative angle of -20 to +80 degrees
  • Large diameter castors (125mm)
  • Individual braked or central locking wheel system
  • Acrylic capped vac formings to facilitate easy cleaning
  • Anti-bacterial powder coated framework
  • Anti-microbial fire retardant upholstery
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Contoured standard upholstery width of 70cm
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Breathing hole and plug
  • Double foot switch
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • IV Pole
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support

item.title: SEERS Innovation Standard 3 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
The Innovation 3 Section Standard Couch features a fully electric height adjustment as well as an electric profiling foot and backrest. With the ability to support very heavy patients, the 3 section standard model is suitable for a wide range of general examination and minor treatment procedures. With the choice of individual locking castors or linked central locking wheel system, this product is very versatile in various applications when fitted with optional accessories.

SEERS Innovation Standard 3 Section Couch - Model Choices
